### Notice of Proposed Procurement - Request for Proposal (RFP) #409 Stream 1 - Financial Audit for Pension Plans

**Title:** Notice of Proposed Procurement - RFP409 - Stream 1 - Financial Audit - Pension Plans
**Reference Number:** cb-459-63828212
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** 2023-11-20
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-05T14:00:00

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) invites eligible suppliers to submit a bid for the provision of financial audit services for pension plans. This requirement is open only to those Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders qualified under Stream 1 - Financial Audit under the SA369 series of SAs.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful bidder will be required to assist the audit teams in conducting the annual financial audit of pension plans in accordance with Generally Accepted Auditing Standards and OAG audit and documentation standards.

**Contract Period:** The period of any resulting contract will be from Contract award to 19 July 2024.

**Security Requirement:**

The work performed under this contract will be at the Reliability Status, and the deliverables associated with the completion of the work detailed in this document will be up to Protected B.

**Trade Agreements:**

The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Selection Criteria:**

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the lowest price.

**Eligible Suppliers:**

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a bid:

1. Welch LLP
2. Deloitte LLP
3. Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
4. Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
5. KPMG LLP
6. BDO Canada LLP
7. Samson & Associates CPA/Consulting Inc.
8. Aniko Consultants Inc., Samson & Associates CPA/Consulting Inc. in Joint Venture
9. Ernst & Young LLP

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or concerns, please contact Soo Yeon Cho at suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca or (613) 952-0213. [240 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario K
